MS.S: Compiles Powershell scripts to executables. Overworking of the great script of Ingo Karstein with GUI support._x000D__x000A_'Invoke-ps2exe script.ps1' (or 'ps2exe script.ps1') compiles to script.exe. Several control parameters available._x000D__x000A_Or use Win-PS2EXE as a graphical front end to the compiler.

# 1.0.17 / 2025-08-21_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -embedFiles to embed files in compiled executable_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.16 / 2025-07-20_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -conHost for force starting compiled executables in Conhost instead of Windows Terminal_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.15 / 2025-01-05_x000D__x000A_- if used only in Powershell Core the module has not to be installed in Powershell 5.1 too_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.14 / 2024-09-15_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -? for compiled executables to show the help of the original Powershell script_x000D__x000A_- in GUI mode window titles are the application title (when set compiling with parameter -title)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.13 / 2023-09-26_x000D__x000A_- now [ and ] are supported in directory name of script_x000D__x000A_- source file might be larger than 16 MB (for whoever that needs)_x000D__x000A_- new addtional parameter text field in Win-PS2EXE_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.12 / 2022-11-22_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -winFormsDPIAware to support scaling for WinForms in noConsole mode (only Windows 10 or up)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.11 / 2021-11-21_x000D__x000A_- fixed password longer than 24 characters error_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -DPIAware to support scaling in noConsole mode_x000D__x000A_- new parameter -exitOnCancel to stop program execution on cancel in input boxes (only in noConsole mode)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.10 / 2021-04-10_x000D__x000A_- parameter outputFile now accepts a target folder (without filename)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.9 / 2021-02-28_x000D__x000A_- new parameter UNICODEEncoding to output as UNICODE_x000D__x000A_- changed parameter debug to prepareDebug_x000D__x000A_- finally dared to use advanced parameters_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.8 / 2020-10-24_x000D__x000A_- refactored_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.7 / 2020-08-21_x000D__x000A_- bug fix for simultanous progress bars in one pipeline_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.6 / 2020-08-10_x000D__x000A_- prompt for choice behaves like Powershell now (only for console mode)_x000D__x000A_- (limited) support for Powershell Core (starts Windows Powershell in the background)_x000D__x000A_- fixed processing of negative parameter values_x000D__x000A_- support for animated progress bars (noConsole mode only)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.5 / 2020-07-11_x000D__x000A_- support for nested progress bars (noConsole mode only)_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.4 / 2020-04-19_x000D__x000A_- Application.EnableVisualStyles() as default for GUI applications, new parameter -noVisualStyles to prevent this_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.3 / 2020-02-15_x000D__x000A_- Ignore control keys in secure string request in console mode_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.1 / 2019-12-16_x000D__x000A_- Fixed "unlimited window width for GUI windows" issue in ps2exe.ps1 and Win-PS2EXE_x000D__x000A_# 1.0.0 / 2019-11-08_x000D__x000A_- First stable release_x000D__x000A_# 0.0.0 / 2019-09-15_x000D__x000A_- Experimental

Compiles Powershell scripts to executables. Overworking of the great script of Ingo Karstein with GUI support._x000D__x000A_'Invoke-ps2exe script.ps1' (or 'ps2exe script.ps1') compiles to script.exe. Several control parameters available._x000D__x000A_Or use Win-PS2EXE as a graphical front end to the compiler.
